title: Update Room Status to Clean
description: A housekeeper has finished cleaning a room and needs to update its status so it can be assigned to a new guest.

tasks.description: The housekeeper selects the room number on their handheld device.
The housekeeper updates the room status from 'Dirty' to 'Clean'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The status is updated in the system.

tasks.description: The system may automatically trigger a notification for a supervisor to inspect the room before marking it as 'Ready'.
tasks.expected_outcome: A supervisor inspection task is automatically generated.
